HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"RT @marylovefreedom: It is very revealing that the WORST slur leftists use is \"White Supremacist\".\nLeftists want White people to be the lowest of the low!"
"\"We're at a point in our culture where it's better to lie about being gay than to be open about loving trans women.\""
"It's ok, I only use it on retards. They're too retarded to get offended."
"RT @michaelbelievs: @Hoshle attack Israel and the jews for Everything,they are not perfect but who is? Its a complicated situation but try to see both sides"
"@MattWalshBlog Protestants are the biggest hypocrites on the planet . All they do is bash Catholicism"
"RT @Bites_his_Nails: Please ffs stop referring to Syrians etc in Europe as refugees, refugees don't bypass places of safety in pursuit of benefits"
"RT @DeeLish2000: @davidiansimpso3 you invite third world trash into your home- you invite their problems too. Our governments are betraying us."
"RT @genophilialove2: Has anyone else noticed that it seems like the more #diverse the people supporting a #politician are the more sold out that politician is?"
"I hate Shemales coz they make me feel fuckin jealous. Like hey, I'm kinda a girl but I can get your chik if I wanted to and screw her better"
"This guy is literally blasting music from a STEREO on this train. Why are old people and kids equally obnoxious? "
